verses.verse: When <S%G3753><s%> they drew near <S%G1448><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethsphage <S%G967><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Go your way <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> that is opposite <S%G2713><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Immediately as <S%G2112><s%> you enter <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> you will find <S%G2147><s%> a young donkey <S%G4454><s%> tied, <S%G1909><s%> on which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G444><s%> has sat. <S%G2523><s%> Untie <S%G3089><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and bring him. <S%G71><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> asks <S%G2036><s%> you, <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Why are you <S%G5213><s%> doing this? <S%G5124><s%>' say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3754><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G2192><s%> needs <S%G5532><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>' and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> back here. <S%G5602><s%>"

Some <S%G5100><s%> of those who <S%G3588><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> asked <S%G3004><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G4160><s%> doing, <S%G3089><s%> untying the young donkey? <S%G4454><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> the young donkey <S%G4454><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> threw <S%G1911><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and Jesus sat <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the way, <S%G3598><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G243><s%> were cutting down <S%G2875><s%> branches <S%G4746><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the trees, <S%G1186><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spreading <S%G4766><s%> them on <S%G1519><s%> the road. <S%G3598><s%>

Those <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> went in front, <S%G4254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> followed, <S%G190><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out, <S%G3004><s%> "Hosanna! <S%G5614><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he who <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%> When <S%G2532><s%> he had looked around <S%G4017><s%> at everything, <S%G3956><s%> it being now <S%G2235><s%> evening, <S%G3798><s%> he went <S%G5607><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>
The <S%G2532><s%> next day, <S%G1887><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> had come <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G575><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> he was hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

Seeing <S%G1492><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off <S%G3113><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> leaves, <S%G5444><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to see if <S%G1487><s%> perhaps <S%G686><s%> he might find <S%G2147><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> it. <S%G846><s%> When <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> leaves, <S%G5444><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the season <S%G2540><s%> for figs. <S%G4810><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to throw out <S%G1544><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who bought <S%G59><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the money changers, <S%G2855><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the seats <S%G2515><s%> of those who <S%G3588><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> the doves. <S%G4058><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> allow <S%G863><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> carry <S%G1308><s%> a container <S%G1223><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the temple. <S%G2411><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> taught, <S%G1321><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Isn't <S%G3756><s%> it <S%G1125><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3450><s%> 'My house <S%G3624><s%> will be called <S%G2564><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the nations? <S%G1484><s%>' But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> have made <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> a den <S%G4693><s%> of robbers! <S%G3754><s%>"

The <S%G2532><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> was astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching. <S%G1322><s%>
When <S%G3753><s%> evening <S%G3796><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> he went <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1854><s%> the city. <S%G4172><s%>
As <S%G2532><s%> they passed by <S%G3899><s%> in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> withered away <S%G3583><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the roots. <S%G4491><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> most certainly <S%G281><s%> I <S%G302><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> may tell <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> <S%G142><s%> 'Be taken up and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%>' and <S%G2532><s%> doesn't <S%G3361><s%> doubt <S%G1252><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> but <S%G235><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> is happening; <S%G1096><s%> he shall have <S%G2071><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G1437><s%> says. <S%G3004><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> I <S%G5124><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> all things whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you pray <S%G154><s%> and ask <S%G4336><s%> for, <S%G4100><s%> believe that <S%G3754><s%> you have received <S%G2983><s%> them, <S%G2532><s%> and you <S%G5213><s%> shall have them. <S%G2071><s%>

Whenever <S%G3752><s%> you stand <S%G4739><s%> praying, <S%G4336><s%> forgive, <S%G863><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> anyone; <S%G5100><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> may also <S%G2532><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> transgressions. <S%G3900><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> do <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> forgive, <S%G863><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> transgressions. <S%G3900><s%>"

and <S%G2532><s%> they began saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "By <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> do you <S%G4160><s%> do these things? <S%G5023><s%> Or <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> these things? <S%G5023><s%>"

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%>— was <S%G2258><s%> it from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> men? <S%G444><s%> Answer <S%G611><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>"

If <S%G1437><s%> we should say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2036><s%> 'From men <S%G444><s%>'" — they feared <S%G5399><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G537><s%> held <S%G2192><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> to <S%G3754><s%> really <S%G3689><s%> be <S%G2258><s%> a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>
